'''Listening Candelight''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Listening Candelight is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]]. After completing the [[World Quest]] ''[[Memories of Gurabad]]'', use the item [[Activation Device: Border Fort]] to activate the chess piece in [[Safhe Shatranj]].
